protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"e5a27","text":"Kriks S, Shim JW, Piao J, Ganat YM, Wakeman DR, Xie Z, Carrillo-Reid L, Auyeung G, Antonacci C, Buch A, Yang L, Beal MF, Surmeier DJ, Kordower JH, Tabar V, Studer L. Dopamine neurons derived from human ES cells efficiently engraft in animal models of Parkinson's disease. Nature. 2011 Nov 6;480(7378):547-51. doi: 10.1038/nature10648. PMID: 22056989; PMCID: PMC3245796.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmd2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mqus","text":"Ryan, S. D., Dolatabadi, N., Chan, S. F., Zhang, X., Akhtar, M. W., Parker, J., … Lipton, S. A.(2013). Isogenic human iPSC Parkinson's model shows nitrosative stress-induced dysfunction in MEF2-PGC1alpha transcription. Cell,  155,  1351–1364.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":219,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pg97","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rhpd","text":"Weykopf B, Haupt S, Jungverdorben J, Flitsch LJ, Hebisch M, Liu GH, Suzuki K, Belmonte JCI, Peitz M, Blaess S, Till A, Brüstle O. Induced pluripotent stem cell-based modeling of mutant LRRK2-associated Parkinson's disease. Eur J Neurosci. 2019 Feb;49(4):561-589. doi: 10.1111/ejn.14345. PMID: 30656775; PMCID: PMC7114274.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h94u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehfv5","text":"Fonseca-Ornelas L, Stricker JMS, Soriano-Cruz S, Weykopf B, Dettmer U, Muratore CR, Scherzer CR, Selkoe DJ. Parkinson-causing mutations in LRRK2 impair the physiological tetramerization of endogenous α-synuclein in human neurons. NPJ Parkinsons Dis. 2022 Sep 16;8(1):118. doi: 10.1038/s41531-022-00380-1. PMID: 36114228; PMCID: PMC9481630.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"24f4l","text":"Day -1: seed 200K cell/cm2 in mTeSR+ medium supplemented with 10µM Rock inhibitor (RI) onto Martigel coated TC plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":25,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":35,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tfi3","text":"Day 0: Differentiation initiation. Aspirate mTeSR+ medium and add SRM media supplemented with 200nM LDN193189 + 10µM SB431542","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":49,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"37mle","text":"Day 1: SRM + LDN + SB supplemented with 100 ng/ml FGF8b, 100 ng/ml ShhC25II and 2µM Purmorphamine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cmbaa","text":"Day 3: SRM + LDN + SB+ FGF8b + ShhC25II + Pur +3 µM CHIR99021","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a97il","text":"Day 4: no feed if medium is not consumed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34qkl","text":"Day 5: 75% SRM + 25% Neurobasal + LDN + SB+ FGF8b + ShhC25II + Pur +CHIR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5flkh","text":"Day 6: no feed if medium is not consumed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bvn3j","text":"Day 8: no feed if medium is not consumed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ahmk5","text":"Day 10: no feed if medium is not consumed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ce6tk","text":"Day 13: Passage cells in a ratio of 1:1 onto matrigel-coated dishes with 30-60min Accutase treatment. Spin down the cells in Dopa mat basal and resuspend in Dopa mat medium supplemented with 10µM Y27632 and CHIR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebstn","text":"Day 20-24: Cells are plated on Poly-D-lysine and laminin coated plates in a density of 2-2.5M cells / 6 well. Cells are dissociated using 60-90min Accutase supplemented with 10µM Y27632.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ci200","text":"Day 25-27: 3µM cytosine arabinoside is added to Dopa mat media. Day 27 cells are washed twice with Dopa mat basal medium to remove any cytosine arabinoside residues. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jcan","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bd022","text":"Around Day 30: Cells are dissociated using Accutase supplemented with 10µM Y27632 and plated in onto Poly-D-lysine and laminin coated dishes. The final density depends on the assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Differentiation of hPSCs into Dopamine neurons
title_html: Differentiation of hPSCs into Dopamine neurons
